oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Turner Clark and Mr. Cunningham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; bookmobiles; Cunningham, Jesse; Clark, Turner; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mr. Clark and Mr. Cunningham standing in front of an early bookmobile for the Shelby County libraries. Note on back: "Turner Clark, Mr. Cunningham, w/Bookmobile outside Cossitt -- circa 1940-48? -- (Please return to Roy Cajero Bkmb. Dept 6/86)."
